channel.title: Slayer Point System
channel.description: Second time posting and no reply's... i followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=489497.0 when you go into the shop it says you have the right amount of points that you earned (if that makes sense) and when you check the value it says "you need 100 Slayer Points" like its supposed to.. but when you try to buy it, it says you don't have enough coins... and you can buy the items with coins.. just posting here as a last resort before just getting rid of the whole thing. Thanks a lot to whoever can help .

item.title: Slayer Point System
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Post your shopassistant.java on pastebin, and i’ll give you a hint on what you’re missing.

item.title: Slayer Point System

item.description:

Second time posting and no reply’s… i followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=489497.0 when you go into the shop it says you have the right amount of points that you earned (if that makes sense) and when you check the value it says “you need 100 Slayer Points” like its supposed to… but when you try to buy it, it says you don’t have enough coins… and you can buy the items with coins… just posting here as a last resort before just getting rid of the whole thing. Thanks a lot to whoever can help .
